description: Try our easy to follow Thai Seafood Salad With Lime Crumbs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Seafood Salad With Lime Crumbs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 whole medium green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
2 limes, rind finely grated and juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Cut down one side of the squid hood and open out flat. Cut into thin strips. Set aside.

Heat 2 tbs of vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add panko crumbs and cook, stirring frequently, for 10 minutes or until golden. Remove from heat and stir in rind. Transfer to a plate and spread out to cool.
Combine 1 tbs vegetable oil, lime juice, fish sauce, sesame oil, sugar and chilli in a jar. Secure lid and shake well. Set aside.

Heat remaining oil in a frying pan over high heat. Add prawns and cook for 3-4 minutes or until just cooked through, turning once. Transfer to a plate. Add half the squid to pan. Toss frequently for 2-3 minutes or until just cooked through. Repeat with remaining squid.
Combine baby leaves, herbs and onion on a platter. Top with seafood, lime crumbs and drizzle with chilli dressing.
